    • MySQLConnection

      public MySQLConnection(String url, Properties properties) throws SQLException
      Trys to establish connection with the MySQL server url and properties provided.
      Parameters:
      url - URL to MySQL server
      properties - Properties for server
      Throws:
      Exception - Thrown if fails to connect
      SQLException

  • Method Details

    • attemptConnection

      public Connection attemptConnection(String url, Properties info) throws SQLException
      Attempt to connect to the mySQL server based on the URL and properties provided. Connection is returned.
      Parameters:
      url - URL of MySQL server
      info - properties of server.
      Returns:
      Connection object established with MySQL database
      Throws:
      Exception - thrown if connection fails
      SQLException

    • executeQuery

      public ResultSet executeQuery(String statement)
      Sends an execute query message to the MySQL server.
      Parameters:
      statement - Raw statement to send
      Returns:
      ResultSet returned from statement

    • updateQuery

      public int updateQuery(String statement)
      Sends a update query message to the MySQL server.
      Parameters:
      statement - Raw statement to send
      Returns:
      number returned from statement

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Returns whether a connection has been stored in the object.
      Returns:
      true if Connection exists, false if not.

    • createTable

      public void createTable(String tableName, LinkedHashMap<String,String> columns)
      Creates a new table with specified columns and their associated type.
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of the table
      columns - Columns specified as key being column name and value being the variable type.

    • tableExist

      public boolean tableExist(String tableName) throws SQLException
      Checks whether a table exists in the MySQL database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of table
      Returns:
      False if table doesn't exist, true if table was found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if issue accessing database

    • isInColumn

      public boolean isInColumn(String tableName, String column, String value)
      Checks if a value is in given column
      Parameters:
      column - Name of column to check in
      value - Value you are finding

    • addRow

      public void addRow(String tableName, HashMap<String,String> columnValues)
      Deprecated.
      Table generates string to be queued to QueryProcessor
      Adds a row to the table with the specified column values
      Parameters:
      tableName - Name of the table in question
      columnValues - Values to add, with key being column and value being column value

    • getFlaggedRows

      public ResultSet getFlaggedRows(String tableName, String indicatorColumn, String flagValue)
      Create a resultset of rows with flag value inside the indicator column.
      Parameters:
      tableName - Table to check
      indicatorColumn - Column to check for flag value
      flagValue - Desired value we want to keep in result set.
      Returns:
